00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <avr/io.h>

00026 #include "led_control.h"
00027 #include "board.h"
00028 #include "../global.h"
00029 
00032 void led_set_band(unsigned char band) {
00033         if ((band >= BAND_160M) && (band <= BAND_12M))
00034                 PORTA |= (1<<(7-band+1));
00035         else if (band == BAND_10M)
00036                 PORTJ |= (1<<7);
00037 }
00038 
00040 void led_set_band_none(void) {
00041                 PORTJ &= ~(1<<7);
00042                 PORTA = 0;
00043 }
00044 
00047 void led_set_ptt(enum enum_led_ptt_state state) {
00048         if (state == LED_STATE_PTT_ACTIVE) {
00049                 //Turn off the red led and turn on the green led
00050                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_PTT_GREEN_BIT);
00051                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_PTT_RED_BIT);
00052         }
00053         else if (state == LED_STATE_PTT_INHIBIT) {
00054                 //Turn off the green led and turn on the red led
00055                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_PTT_RED_BIT);
00056                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_PTT_GREEN_BIT);
00057         }
00058         else if (state == LED_STATE_PTT_OK) {
00059                 //Turn off both
00060                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_PTT_GREEN_BIT);
00061                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_PTT_RED_BIT);
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00067 void led_set_error(enum enum_led_state state) {
00068         if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00069                 PORTH |= (1<<LED_ERROR_BIT);
00070         else
00071                 PORTH &= ~(1<<LED_ERROR_BIT);
00072 }
00073 
00076 void led_set_rotation_active(enum enum_led_state state) {
00077         if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00078                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_ROTATION_ACTIVE_BIT);
00079         else
00080                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_ROTATION_ACTIVE_BIT);
00081 }
00082 
00086 void led_set_tx_ant(unsigned char index, enum enum_led_state state) {
00087         switch(index) {
00088                 case 0: if (state == LED_STATE_ON) {
00089                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00090                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00091                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00092                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00093                                                 }
00094                                                 else {
00095                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00096                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00097                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00098                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00099                                                 }
00100                                                 break;
00101                 case 1: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00102                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00103                                                 else
00104                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00105                                                 break;
00106                 case 2: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00107                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00108                                                 else
00109                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00110                                                 break;
00111                 case 3: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00112                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00113                                                 else
00114                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00115                                                 break;
00116                 case 4: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00117                                                         PORTL |= (1<<LED_TX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00118                                                 else
00119                                                         PORTL &= ~(1<<LED_TX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00120                                                 break;
00121                 default: break;
00122         }
00123 }
00124 
00128 void led_set_rx_ant(unsigned char index, enum enum_led_state state) {
00129         switch(index) {
00130                 case 0: if (state == LED_STATE_ON) {
00131                                                         PORTH |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00132                                                         PORTH |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00133                                                         PORTB |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00134                                                         PORTB |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00135                                                 }
00136                                                 else {
00137                                                         PORTH &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00138                                                         PORTH &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00139                                                         PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00140                                                         PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00141                                                 }
00142                                                 break;
00143                 case 1: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00144                                                         PORTH |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00145                                                 else
00146                                                         PORTH &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON1_BIT);
00147                                                 break;
00148                 case 2: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00149                                                         PORTH |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00150                                                 else
00151                                                         PORTH &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON2_BIT);
00152                                                 break;
00153                 case 3: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00154                                                         PORTB |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00155                                                 else
00156                                                         PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON3_BIT);
00157                                                 break;
00158                 case 4: if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00159                                                         PORTB |= (1<<LED_RX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00160                                                 else
00161                                                         PORTB &= ~(1<<LED_RX_BUTTON4_BIT);
00162                                                 break;
00163                 default: break;
00164         }
00165 }

00171                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_ROTATE_BIT);
00172         else
00173                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_ROTATE_BIT);
00174 }

00180                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_TXRX_BIT);
00181         else
00182                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_TXRX_BIT);
00183 }

00187 void led_set_rxant(enum enum_led_state state) {
00188         if (state == LED_STATE_ON) {
00189                 PORTD |= (1<<LED_RXANT_BIT);
00190         }
00191         else {
00192                 PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_RXANT_BIT);
00193         }
00194 }

00200                 PORTC |= (1<<LED_AUX_BIT);
00201         else
00202                 PORTC &= ~(1<<LED_AUX_BIT);
00203 }

00207 void led_set_submenu(enum enum_led_state state) {
00208         if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00209                 PORTD |= (1<<LED_SUBMENU_BIT);
00210         else
00211                 PORTD &= ~(1<<LED_SUBMENU_BIT);
00212 }

00216 void led_set_menu(enum enum_led_state state) {
00217         if (state == LED_STATE_ON)
00218                 PORTK |= (1<<LED_MENU_BIT);
00219         else
00220                 PORTK &= ~(1<<LED_MENU_BIT);
00221 }
00222 
00225 void led_set_all(enum enum_led_state state) {
00226         if (state == LED_STATE_ON) {
00227                 led_set_rx_ant(0,LED_STATE_ON);
00228                 led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_ON);
00229                 led_set_error(LED_STATE_ON);
00230                 led_set_ptt(LED_STATE_PTT_ACTIVE);
00231                 led_set_rxant(LED_STATE_ON);
00232                 led_set_txrx(LED_STATE_ON);
00233                 led_set_rotate(LED_STATE_ON);
00234                 led_set_aux(LED_STATE_ON);
00235                 led_set_menu(LED_STATE_ON);
00236         }
00237         else {
00238                 led_set_rx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00239                 led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00240                 led_set_error(LED_STATE_OFF);
00241                 led_set_ptt(LED_STATE_PTT_OK);
00242                 led_set_rxant(LED_STATE_OFF);
00243                 led_set_txrx(LED_STATE_OFF);
00244                 led_set_rotate(LED_STATE_OFF);
00245                 led_set_aux(LED_STATE_OFF);
00246                 led_set_menu(LED_STATE_OFF);
00247                 PORTG &= ~(1<<0);
00248                 PORTG &= ~(1<<1);
00249                 led_set_band(BAND_UNDEFINED);
00250         }
00251 }
